Objective Title: Define capitalization table (cap table)

Activity Content: {"authoring":{"parts":[{"gradingApproach":"automatic","hints":[{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"A capitalization table or a cap table will typically perform one of the option presented and the other three options are performed by various financial statements that are not cap tables. A capitalization table or cap table will typically include a list of a company's stakeholders with their percent of ownership. Objective Title: Define capitalization table (cap table)
Feedback: {"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Correct. A capitalization table or cap table will typically include a list of a company's stakeholders with their percent of ownership. Typically the table will have the names on the left most column and the percent of ownership on the right most column."}],"id":"3201194431","type":"p"}],"id":"433164905"}
Activity Content: {"authoring":{"parts":[{"gradingApproach":"automatic","hints":[{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"A capitalization table or a cap table will typically perform one of the option presented and the other three options are performed by various financial statements that are not cap tables. "}],"id":"1707989903","type":"p"}],"id":"3816251947"},{"content":[{"children":[{"text":""}],"id":"3257022087","type":"p"}],"id":"2066945239"},{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Capitalization tables or cap tables include the company's capitalization and a company's ownership list."}],"id":"512665181","type":"p"}],"id":"1737020685"}],"id":"1","outOf":null,"responses":[{"feedback":{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Correct. A capitalization table or cap table will typically include a list of a company's stakeholders with their percent of ownership. Typically the table will have the names on the left most column and the percent of ownership on the right most column."}],"id":"3201194431","type":"p"}],"id":"433164905"},"id":"210951327","rule":"input like {2304319313}","score":1},{"feedback":{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Incorrect. Make sure to select the definition of capitalization that does NOT fit the context of startups and dilutions."}],"id":"984370972","type":"p"}],"id":"827187463"},"id":"3925157321","rule":"input like {1573499596}","score":0},{"feedback":{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Incorrect"}],"id":"1631591924","type":"p"}],"id":"38806014"},"id":"2394377500","rule":"input like {.*}","score":0}],"scoringStrategy":"average"}],"previewText":"Which of the following is NOT a definition of capitalization with respect to startups?","targeted":[[["2289772985"],"1452465422"],[["589245584"],"3980456115"],[["1573499596"],"3925157321"]],"transformations":[{"id":"427240006","operation":"shuffle","path":"choices"}],"version":2},"bibrefs":[],"choices":[{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"How much a company is worth"}],"id":"1908543220","type":"p"}],"id":"2289772985"},{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"A companyâ€™s total market value"}],"id":"2726682352","type":"p"}],"id":"589245584"},{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"An accounting method in which a cost is included in the value of an asset and expensed over the useful life of that asset"}],"id":"2347934351","type":"p"}],"id":"364143824"},{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Valuation"}],"id":"1429575397","type":"p"}],"id":"1573499596"}],"stem":{"content":[{"children":[{"text":"Which of the following is NOT a definition of capitalization with respect to startups?"}],"id":"1741320282","type":"p"}],"id":"798771705"}}
